text:
Repository: public-monday-images
Purpose: Handles image processing and storage routines for Monday.com integrations.

Capabilities:
- Acts as a public endpoint for temporary image hosting or transformation.
- Processes images into formats compatible with Zapier, Monday.com, or CMS platforms.
- Routinely used in automated workflows requiring placeholder images, thumbnails, or temporary assets.

Technologies: Node.js, API routing, cloud storage integration.
